definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
fan/sliding, hinged or detachable flat part of sth/classifier for doors, windows etc
to fan/to slap sb on the face

sentences.english: The breeze fanned our faces, please turn the fan off.
sentences.chinese: 微風輕輕吹在我們的臉上，請把電扇關掉。

sentences.english: Then you turn up the fan to number 3 and it'll go fast.
sentences.chinese: 然後把電扇開到三擋的位置，它就轉得快了。

sentences.english: I would like to discuss with you our agency of your electric fans.
sentences.chinese: 我想同貴方商談你們電電扇的署理問題。

sentences.english: Some students may forget to switch off the lights and fans ijn their classroom.
sentences.chinese: 有些同學可能會忘記關教師裏的燈和電扇。

sentences.english: The electric fan blades whirled in the hot room.
sentences.chinese: 電扇的槳葉在悶熱的房內旋轉著。

sentences.english: That fan makes a lot of noise, though.
sentences.chinese: 不過那個電扇噪音很大。

sentences.english: An electric fan twirls. Cantonese music on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 小喫店白天，電扇轉，廣東音樂。

sentences.english: We appreciate your efforts in pushing the sale of our electric fans.
sentences.chinese: 我們感激貴方在推銷我方電扇產品方面所做的努力。

sentences.english: "arctic Ocean" electric fan presents a cool world to you.
sentences.chinese: “北冰洋”電扇，帶給您一個風涼世界。

sentences.english: Having read an electrical book. he began to repair the electric fan.
sentences.chinese: 看了一本有關電的書籍後，他開始修理電扇。

sentences.english: When not in a room, switch off the lights and the fan.
sentences.chinese: 當你不在室內，關掉所有的燈和電扇。

sentences.english: We are pleased to inform you that we handle a wide range of electric fans.
sentences.chinese: 特此奉告，我方經營的電扇品種齊全。

sentences.english: All that the fan blows is hot air.
sentences.chinese: 電扇吹出來的都是熱風。

sentences.english: The fan whirred in the corner of the room.
sentences.chinese: 電扇在屋子的角落裏嗡嗡地轉動。

definition: to let air pass through/to ventilate
summer sleeping mat (e.g. of woven split bamboo)/CL:張|张[zhang1],領|领[ling3]
